name: Linger (Demo)
description: Linger is a top-down puzzle game set in the dark recesses of the Earth's crust. You play as Kley, a mysterious creature birthed from an omniscient force, who has been awakened to find and destroy "The One That Lingers".  Manipulate darkness to solve puzzles while uncovering the secrets of the underground and (hopefully) saving the human race from an unstoppable evil.
